flavorText: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.

foreignData.flavorText: Es ist sich der Vielfalt an Arten in Lorwyn nicht bewusst und sieht immer nur sich, tausendfach widergespiegelt.
foreignData.name: Spiegelwesen
foreignData.text:
Wandelwicht (Diese Karte hat alle Kreaturentypen.)
{X}: Bis zum Ende des Zuges haben Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft X/X und erhalten alle Kreaturentypen.

foreignData.flavorText: Ignorante de la diversidad de Lorwyn, solo se ve a sí mismo, reflejado miles de veces.
foreignData.name: Entidad del espejo
foreignData.text:
Cambiaformas. (Esta carta es de todos los tipos de criatura.)
{X}: Hasta el final del turno, las criaturas que controlas tienen una fuerza y resistencia base de X/X y ganan todos los tipos de criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: Ignorant la diversité de Lorwyn, il ne voit que son propre reflet démultiplié à l'infini.
foreignData.name: Entité miroir
foreignData.text:
Changelin (Cette carte a tous les types de créature.)
{X} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, les créatures que vous contrôlez ont une force et une endurance de base de X/X et acquièrent tous les types de créature.

foreignData.flavorText: Inconsapevole delle diversità di Lorwyn, riesce a vedere solo se stessa, riflessa migliaia e migliaia di volte.
foreignData.name: Entità Riflettente
foreignData.text:
Cangiante (Questa carta ha tutti i tipi di creatura.)
{X}: Fino alla fine del turno, le creature che controlli hanno forza e costituzione base X/X e hanno tutti i tipi di creatura.

foreignData.flavorText: それはローウィンの多様さを気にもかけず、自分自身のみを見て、その反射を何千回も投げかける。
foreignData.name: 鏡の精体
foreignData.text:

foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 多相の戦士

foreignData.flavorText: Alheia à diversidade de Lorwyn, ela só vê a si mesma, mil vezes refletida.

foreignData.flavorText: Не ведая о многообразии Лорвина, оно видит лишь бесконечное отражение самого себя.
foreignData.name: Зеркальное Нечто

化形（此牌是所有生物類別。）

name: Mirror Entity
originalText:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

rulings.text: Changeling applies in all zones, not just the battlefield.

Mirror Entity's ability overwrites any effects that previously set a creature's base power and/or toughness. Any existing effects or counters that raise or lower a creature's power and/or toughness continue to apply to the creature's newly-set power and toughness.
Activating the ability with X = 0 will cause all creatures you control to become 0/0 and be put into the graveyard.

text:
